Boosting Ecommerce Conversion Rates with Lifestyle Product Images
text:
Though many online marketplaces require merchants to upload only white background product images for standardization, brands do not have to follow this rule when managing their own ecommerce website or social media.

Read more on - https://www.martechcube.com/boosting-ecommerce-conversion-rates-with-lifestyle-product-images/

Ask HN: Laptop for CPU-Intensive TensorFlow
text:
My colleague wants a new laptop to run windows and train tensorflow models on the cpu; something with lots of cpu cores that will train cpu-based tensorflow models fast.

My suggestion was a MacBook Pro M1max but they want an off the shelf windows machine.

Any specific suggestions?

Ask HN: What food/diet change has been life changing?
text: There is lots of nutrition advice out there, sometimes contradictory. I'm curious to hear about changes others have made they consider life changing. It can be food, diet in general, supplements, or beverages. Please share the change, how it impacted you, and whether or not the change stuck or you reverted back to old habits after some time.
